transcript:
Customer: Ek ticketed beauty ko call kariye, humara call lena.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha, main is speaking Glam Beauty Cosmetics.
Executive: Ha bolo.
Customer: Mam very good afternoon Pravesh Sharma this side from IndiaMART office Noida senior manager is it a right time to discuss with you mam?
Customer: Ha bolo bolo.
Executive: Ji mam actually na aapka abhi thode din pehle discussion hua tha meri team member Dharmendra se to kahin na kahin aapne not satisfied ka feedback share kara tha thoda mujhe batayenge mam kya problem aa raha hai jo wo solve nahi kar pa rahe main ek bar check karwata team se.
Customer: Problem wo mujhe puch rahe the ki bylead aapko matlab aapko maine bola ki mujhe koi aisi bylead nahi aati hai ki jis se mujhe benefit ho matlab particular naam wali jo humne shayad pehle baat ki thi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Wo aati hai.
Executive: Naam wali matlab jo aapne matlab maine aapki recording bhi suni conversation ki matlab jo aap jis brand mein deal karte hain uski right mam?
Customer: Nahi wo aisi naam wali nahi bol rahi main mujhe particular brand jisko jo chahiye waisi aati hai matlab mujhe aisi chahiye ki jis mein particularly mention na kiya ho ki mujhe yehi chahiye aisa.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Khud ko jaise naya naya koi business karne ja raha hai aur wo search kar raha hai ya face wash ke liye ya moisturizer ke liye ya shampoo ke liye to mujhe wo particular naam jaise Mama Earth hai ki Nivea hai ki Himalaya hai aise mujhe particular nahi chahiye.
Customer: To mujhe waisi hi bylead dikhti hai mujhe koi naam bina particular naam wali koi dikhti hi nahi hai main do teen din se ye dekh rahi hu.
Executive: Achcha matlab pehle dikh rahi thi ya do teen din se hi hua hai matlab?
Customer: Nahi pehle bhi nahi aayi hai hamare baat hui thi jab changes karwaye sab sare pehle bhi aisi hi aati thi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To maine main unko wo bol rahi thi ki mujhe aisi bylead nahi chahiye kyunki mujhe sari naam wali kyun dikh rahi hai ki jisko jo particular us pe hum call karte hai to wo bol wo mujhe aisa bol rahe the ki to aapko convert karna padega apni brand ke liye maine bola wo sahi baat hai lekin jo banda char panch che saal se ek hi product use kar matlab bech raha hai wo jaldi se convert nahi hota to mere pass naye buyers ki bylead aani chahiye na jo abhi business start karne ja rahe hai ya kuch abhi naya start kiya ya fir wo change karte rehte hai.
Executive: Samajh gaya mam.
Customer: To main unko convert kar paungi na.
Executive: Samajh gaya main samajh gaya mam aap jo matlab aapka jo manufacturing rehta hai specifically aap apni hi brand ka bechte hain jaise third party ka.
Customer: Nahi hum manufacturing nahi karte hamara third party manufacturing hai abhi hum manufacturing short time mein start karne wale hai after six month.
Executive: Okay to koi bhi aapko kisi bhi.
Customer: Isme hamara sab setup ho jayega.
Executive: Ha kisi bhi brand ka aapse koi mangega to aap de sakte hain unko right mam matlab.
Customer: Ha uske baad de sakte hai abhi nahi de sakte abhi to hamara khud ka brand hai jo hum third party manufacturing karwate hai.
Executive: Okay okay abhi future mein jaake aap denge abhi to nahi de payenge right mam.
Customer: Ha abhi to mujhe mujhe suppose aap aapko business start karna hai aap samjho barabar to aap search karoge ki mujhe face wash ya shampoo ya aise start karna hai moisturizer chahiye to usme dala aapne dala ki mujhe face moisturizer chahiye dry skin ke liye oily skin ke liye ya normal jo bhi hai.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: To wo bylead mere kaam ki hai ki main us bande ko samjha sakungi ki ha hamara khud ka brand hai hamare pass itne itne moisturizer hai aap chaho to usme deal kar sakte ho lekin kisi ne dala mujhe Nivea moisturizer hi chahiye to main usko kitna bhi convert karna chaungi wo nahi aayega na mere pass.
Executive: Samajh gaya samajh gaya.
Customer: Ha to wo mujhe aise main unko wo samjha rahi thi isiliye maine feedback wo diya main unko wo samjha rahi thi ki aise to koi convert nahi hoga aap bhi ho che saal se ek hi product bech rahe hoge to convert nahi honge main bhi nahi houngi.
Executive: Main samajh gaya main samajh gaya.
Customer: Jaldi se koi convert nahi hoga aur ye cosmetic product hai face ke regarding hai itni jaldi koi dusri pe bharosa nahi karta.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sensitive hota hai sensitive part rehta hai wo.
Customer: Meri brand achchi hai maine main bol rahi meri brand natural hai sab hai lekin usko to ekdam se to nahi hoga na to wo jo naya banda hai jisko naya chahiye product start karna hai wo samajh lega ki chalo dekhte hai check karke chalo ek bar buy karke dekhte hai to wo convert ho jayega lekin jo panch che saal se do saal se ek hi product use kar raha hai wo to nahi hoga.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: To main unko wo samjha rahi thi to wo samajh nahi rahe the.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Isiliye maine wo feedback dala.
Executive: Nahi nahi koi problem nahi hai mam main aapki baat samajh gaya mam dekhiye do cheeze hoti hai yaha pe IndiaMART pe dekhiye aap bhi ye understand karenge mam kuch brands itne jyada popular hai to un brands ka naam thoda jyada dikhega aapko but aisa nahi hoga ki bina brand ke naam ki lead nahi aayegi bilkul aayengi but ek algorithm hamare yaha pe rehta hai mam main do cheeze aapko request karunga jaise aapka vitamin C serum hai sunscreen hai hair growth serum hai ye aapke kuch keywords hai main aapko whatsapp pe bhi abhi un keywords ka list share kar dunga hamare yaha pe mam kya hota hai agar aap yaha pe 50 keyword bhi add karwa ke baithe apne catalog mein but agar aap last 15 din mein kisi bhi keyword ka ek bhi lead nahi uthate to hum uska lead ka frequency dikhana kam kar dete hai.
Executive: Same same hota hai location mein bhi agar for example Delhi se aapne ek bhi lead nahi uthai to hum aapko lead dikhana band kar denge to aap thode time ke liye na jaise din mein aap teen char bar aaye aapko dikha koi aapko bina brand ki lead nahi dikh rahi to aap usko manually bhi search kare ek bar us manually search karne se kya hoga ek to us keyword ka jitna bhi lead available hoga alag alag location ka sara aapke samne visible ho jayega to usme.
Customer: Okay matlab hum keyword se search kar sakte hai aisa hai.
Executive: Ha ha bilkul bilkul kar sakte hai mujhe to mujhe aisa tha ki jo wo dikh rahi hai wohi karna hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi dikhne mein kya hota hai ki hum aapke purchasing ki pattern ke basis pe dikhate hain bhi aapko face wash night cream ki jyada dikh rahi hongi right mam abhi sunscreen bhi aapka product hai uske baad to aapke almost 10 12 keyword active hone chahiye minimum to aapka lead dikhna jyada shuru hoga matlab herbal face wash ho gaya ye sab to aap kar hi rahe hain matlab aisa nahi hai aap use nahi kar rahe aap achche se use kar rahe hain but ye algorithm aise run karta hai mam ki IndiaMART ye bolta hai ki agar last 15 din mein aapne ek bhi lead nahi uthaya to kahin na kahin aap uska lead chahte nahi kyunki ek lead ko hum dikha hi dete hain 15 din mein bear minimum har keyword ka to abhi kya hoga ki wo keyword kuch aapke inactive ho gaye to aapko unka lead nahi dikh raha hoga to first ek aapko kya karna hai manually search karna hai right mam jo aapke major major products hai chahe herbal face wash hai aap unko manually din mein do teen bar jarur search kare un keywords ko jaise abhi maine search kara aapka minimum order quantity kitna rehta hai mam jo aap entertain karte hain bear minimum 25.
Executive: 25000 ka minimum hona chahiye right mam.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai to mam main bhi kuch lead abhi Dharmendra se bolunga share karenge hum bhi aapse kuch lead abhi available bhi hai jaise maine abhi aapse baat karte hue search kara na maine herbal face wash dala to kuch lead aayi hai par wo 10 12000 ki hai ek bar na mam aapke jo main product hai aap ensure kariye aap uska ek lead jarur uthaye 15 din mein dusra dusra aapka lead dikhne ka frequency dekhiyega aur badh jayega jitna badhega agar abhi aapko 50 lead dikh rahi hai agar 200 lead dikhegi to usme without brand ka dikhne ka aapka probability badh jayega right mam to ek to ye ho gaya dusra mam aapko kya karna hai jitna bhi IndiaMART ke buyer ko aapko call karna hai sara IndiaMART ki app ke through karna hai LMS ke through lead manager waha pe click to call ka option aata hai jitna jyada aap call karenge hamara system.
Customer: Main wahin se karti hu sare call direct nahi karti hu us pe se hi karti hu.
Executive: Nahi abhi thoda sa kam ho gaya tha call July mein 50 60 call mahine ka hota tha jo abhi 10 15 20 pe aa gaya hai to ensure kariye matlab maximum first first call aap at least hamari app ke through kariye usse mam ye fayda hoga hamara hamara system track kar lega ki aap is particular location mein keyword mein active hai aap call kare kyunki hum call ko na highest priority ka effort mante hai kyunki aapka effort lagta hai call mein lagana dial karna aur baat karna to isme aapka dekhiyega lead number aur aapka inquiry direct inquiry bhi badhega jab aapka listing improve hoga to direct inquiry customer shayad might bhi aapka brand dekh ke directly aapko bhi call kare right mam to yehi rahega aur dusra aap kuch customer jinse aapki baat achchi hoti hai kabhi kabhar aapko lagta hoga customer bolta hoga main do mahine baad aapko call karunga right mam ya teen mahine baad ya do mahine baad order lunga to aap unse na rating jarur mangiye apni company ke liye aapki jo industry hai na mam is industry mein customer dekhta hai abhi aapko aapki company ko ek hi rating mila hua hai abhi tak so jab aap unse ha jab aap unse aapke catalog pe 15 20 rating ho jayengi to kahin na kahin buyer ko bhi dikhega ki ha inko achchi rating mili hai to inke product hum use karenge samajh rahe hain mam kyunki jaise aapne bataya bahut sensitive hota hai skin har koi 50 bar sochta hai koi cheez kharidte hue skin se related change karne se pehle to wo cheez aap kariye aap dekhiyega aapko aane wale dino mein benefit milega baki main bhi aapka catalog pura bhi check karwa ke improve karwaunga whatsapp group abhi hum aapke sath bana lenge thik hai mam kuch bhi kuch bhi issue rahe to aap mujhe batayega same number pe Pravesh Sharma mera naam hai thik hai mam okay okay okay thank you mam thank you precious time mam okay thank you have a nice day thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads without specific brand names.

- Wants buyleads of new buyers.



Resolution:

- Executive explained algorithm for lead visibility.

- Advised manually searching keywords.

- Suggested using IndiaMART app for calls.

- Recommended asking customers for ratings.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share keywords list on WhatsApp.

- Executive will ask Dharmendra to share leads.

- Executive will check and improve catalog.

- Executive will create a WhatsApp group.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, keywords, manual search, ratings, algorithm
